text: NEW: During a private call, Texas Gov. Greg Abbott admitted that “every scientific and medical report shows” state reopenings “ipso facto” lead to an increase in coronavirus cases, even as he publicly announced plans to end an executive stay-at-home order https://t.co/d2r4xeC6sb
